mainEntityOfPage.description: Create a custom schedule and Route4Me will automatically create, plan, and dispatch your recurring routes on a daily, weekly, monthly, or annual basis. This 'set and forget' solution allows you to plan in advance and automate your routing process for repeat business. Simply customize your schedule, select service frequency, blacklist nonworking days, and Route4Me handles the rest—keeping your team informed and customers happy. You can easily modify future routes at any moment, adding stops or removing cancelled visits as needed, while maintaining visibility of your future workload and schedule adherence.
